verbs.description: In another wacky attempt to [V: get] [ARG1: President Trump] [ARG2: out of the legal firestorm that is consuming his presidency] , his new personal lawyer Rudy Giuliani is now calling for the Justice Department to intervene and " close down the Russia investigation . "
